DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will conduct a non-inferiority clinical trial to evaluate whether children trained in pedestrian safety amidst a Google Cardboard virtual environment achieve equivalent levels of pedestrian safety to children trained in a full semi-immersive virtual pedestrian environment
DOC.brief_title: Virtual Reality by Mobile Phone: Improving Child Pedestrian Safety
DOC.criteria: children ages 78 and their families one sibling per family, randomly chosen if multiple siblings are eligible children and parent speak English disabilities that prohibit participants from valid understanding of or participation in the experimental protocol families that plan to move more than 50 miles away over the next year families unable to commit to frequent visits required in the study protocol
